title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI chatbot
description: TechCrunch published a comprehensive guide covering ChatGPT's latest features, updates, and frequently asked questions. The article provides a complete overview of OpenAI's viral text-generating system, including the most recent developments and practical information for users.
author: TechCrunch

title: Amazon hopes to jump-start its AI coding tool Kiro by giving it away to startups
description: Amazon is offering a free year of its AI coding tool Kiro to startup founders to compete in the crowded AI coding tools market. The strategy aims to win developer adoption by making Kiro accessible to early-stage companies who already have many AI coding options available.
author: TechCrunch

title: Amazon previews 3 AI agents, including 'Kiro' that can code on its own for days
description: Amazon Web Services unveiled three new 'frontier agents' including Kiro, an autonomous AI coding agent that can work for hours or days without human intervention. Kiro operates through spec-driven development where humans instruct, confirm, or correct assumptions as it codes independently.
author: TechCrunch
